user.description:
This sensor uses official API to get [hourly pricing of electricity (PVPC)](https://www.esios.ree.es/es/pvpc) in Spain.
For more precise explanation visit the [integration docs](https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/pvpc_hourly_pricing/).
